channel.title: NPC Problem
channel.description:
[center] Client - SWAT's 2010 Client[/center] [center]Server - DeltaCleaned[/center]
Problem: After adding the NPCID 6261 to my autospawn (Bandos Boss) I get the following error when running the server.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6261 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2397) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:417) at Server.main(Server.java:108)[/code]
Here is the code on each line,
Line 2396: [code]combatLevel[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer.parseInt(token3[2]);[/code]
Line 417: [code]loadNPCList("npc.cfg");[/code]
Line 108: [code]npcHandler = new NPCHandler();[/code]
Here is my full NPChandler.java.
http://pastebin.com/RMmmZAjV

item.title: NPC Problem
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

Ok I went through the ID’s. Any NPCID above 3850 give me that error in Run.bat.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Problem
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Might’ve been something SWAT added to keep n00bs away.
You shoulda mentioned what client it was lol.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Problem

item.description:

[center] Client - SWAT’s 2010 Client[/center]
[center]Server - DeltaCleaned[/center]

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6261 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2397) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:417) at Server.main(Server.java:108)
